messages.subject: Re: scary school youtube video
messages.msgSnippet: ~~ ... Dayna is on the Shinewithunschooling list run by Anne Ohman. She will also be at the Live and Learn conference this fall in Black Mountain I believe.:)
messages.messageBody:
~~
> Is Dayna on any of the unschooling yahoo groups?~~


Dayna is on the Shinewithunschooling list run by Anne Ohman. She will
also be at the Live and Learn conference this fall in Black Mountain I
believe.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.msgSnippet: Danya is on one of the groups but I don t remember which one..  Possibly on Always Unschooled or the SHINE list but I am really not sure. Erica ... -- They say
messages.messageBody:
Danya is on one of the groups but I don't remember which one.. Possibly on
Always Unschooled or the SHINE list but I am really not sure.

Erica
